00017 // Standard size for an InMobi Ad, 320x48 pixels
00018 #define INMOBI_AD_UNIT_320x48     9
00019 
00020 // Medium Rectangle size for an InMobi Ad, 300x250 pixels, designed for all device size,
00021 // especially in a UISplitView's left pane. 
00022 // can be called from an iPhone/iPod Touch
00023 #define INMOBI_AD_UNIT_300x250    10
00024 
00025 // Leaderboard size for an InMobi Ad, 728x90 pixels, designed for iPad's screen size.
00026 #define INMOBI_AD_UNIT_728x90     11
00027 
00028 // Full Banner size for an InMobi Ad, 468x60 pixels, designed for iPad's screen size,
00029 // especially in a UIPopoverController or in UIModalPresentationFormSheet placement.
00030 #define INMOBI_AD_UNIT_468x60     12
00031 
00032 //Skyscraper size for an InMobi Ad, 120x600 pixels, designed for iPad's screen size.
00033 #define INMOBI_AD_UNIT_120x600    13
